channel.title: Adding a $ sign by name? Like a staff icon? Rep++
channel.description:
EDIT:
Source: Edge4Pk DELTA Client: Edge4Pk DELTA
____________________
I have a donator right set, but when I do ::yell massage the little donator icon doesnt come up beside name
How do I make this show up?
Example:
::yell hey!
$ Billy Bob - Hey
Rep++ for help.
